is_featured.name: The Art of Minimalism in Modern Design
is_featured.description: Explore how minimalism influences contemporary design choices, from architecture to interior decor. Discover practical tips for incorporating minimalistic principles to create serene and functional spaces that prioritize simplicity and usability.
is_featured.img_alt: cartoon illustration of burger filled with onion lettuce meat patty cheese with teal background jpeg

is_featured.name: The Future of Smart Homes: Integrating Technology for a Seamless Lifestyle
is_featured.description: Dive into the world of DIY furniture building using reclaimed wood. This post outlines essential tools and techniques, plus step-by-step guides to create beautiful, sustainable pieces that enhance your living space while reducing waste.
is_featured.img_alt: cartoon illustration of windows laptop with grey background jpeg

is_featured.name: Dive into the world of DIY furniture building using reclaimed wood
is_featured.description: This post delves into how philosophical ideas shape our understanding of design. Explore concepts like functionality, aesthetics, and emotional connection, and learn how to create spaces that reflect deeper values and purpose.
is_featured.img_alt: cartoon illustration of simple small pond surounded by trees and rocks with mild blue background  jpeg

is_featured.name: Simplifying Your Life: The Power of Decluttering
is_featured.description: Discover the benefits of decluttering your home and mind for a simpler lifestyle. This post offers practical strategies to reduce excess, create organized spaces, and cultivate a more intentional approach to daily living.
is_featured.img_alt: cartoon illustration of gray dslr style camera with mild orange background jpeg

is_featured.name: The Joy of Creating: Finding Your Artistic Voice
is_featured.description: This post encourages readers to embrace their creativity, regardless of skill level. Learn how to explore different artistic mediums, overcome creative blocks, and find inspiration in everyday life to express your unique artistic voice.
is_featured.img_alt: cartoon illustration of coding themed image featuring git like logo command line interface with skyblue background jpeg

is_featured.name: Nourishing Simplicity: Wholesome Recipes for Busy Lives
is_featured.description: This post presents easy, nutritious recipes designed for those with a hectic schedule. Discover meal prep tips and quick dishes that prioritize healthy ingredients without sacrificing flavor, making it easier to eat well daily.
is_featured.img_alt: cartoon illustration of small pond with lillypads and lotus in the middle surrounded by stones and plants with lavender background jpeg

is_featured.name: Quickly Integrate Tailwind CSS into an Existing Next.js App in Just 4 Steps
is_featured.description: Recent versions of Next.js come packaged with Tailwind CSS, which we can enable during project creation. If you missed installing it out of the box, this guide will walk you through four simple steps to install and configure Tailwind CSS. Even though this post is tailored for Next.js, a similar method can be used to set up Tailwind in a React.js application as well.
is_featured.img_alt: minimalistic cartoon style laptop nextjs app tailwindcss color swatches code snippets black outline jpeg
